A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars: The Last Jedi Pros: - Fantastic Acting - Amazing Directing - Terrific Script - Beautiful Cinematography - Magnificent Editing - Great VFX - Decent Pacing - Very Emotionally resonant\, while also very funny - Loving tribute to Carrie Fisher - Good Action Scenes - More fun the 2nd time around Cons: - None Overall Grade: A+ (10/10)
